text: John Robert Sitlington Sterrett was an American classical scholar and archeologist. He was Professor of Greek at Cornell University from 1901. He was known for his expeditions, to present-day Turkey and other places in the Near East.History of Collection Some of his work was illustrated by photographers by John Henry Haynes. ==Notes== ==External links== * *The J. R. Sitlington Sterrett Collection of Archaeological Photographs, Cornell Collections of Antiquities Category:American classical scholars Category:American archaeologists Category:Classical scholars of Cornell University
title: John Robert Sitlington Sterrett
